attributes.action: more parking areas available for HGV's with better services & showering facilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with driver hours getting tighter & tighter & laybys & truck stops disappearing it will be a good idea for the government to make every local authority create a parking area for HGV's with shower facilities.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
